Text:
Hey.... didn't rip these myself, but accompanying source .txt (which I didn't include 'cause I accidently shunted it into a different directory before I boxed the torrent file) shows dBpoweramp utilizing accuraterip/secure mode features. IMO they DO sound a lot cleaner & "crisper" than the mp3's that are floating around out there. I've already seeded 3x, but I'll keep my modem in the pot for awhile longer.
